Articles.Content:
I joined this community for several months, but never posted here this it's my first time posting in this community, so I don't know how to use the tools available here. I play KSP since the version 0.13.3, and wanna know when this game will be completely released, it will go to the version 1.0?

Sorry for the bad english, am not american or british, just speak portuguese.

Bye everyone!
Your English is fine, and the version numbers don't mean anything except that a higher number is new than a lower number.
Yes!Landed on the Mun,Duna,Kerbin,Eve, but I was trying to "land" on Jool,Dres,Eeloo,unfortunately I couldn't.
